The "Robyn is here" album is the US version from 1997, not the Swedish 1995/1996? version. "Where Did Our Love Go" was replaced by "Show Me Love", and there are other differences, I guess they remixed some of it since some songs are longer/shorter. i don't know, I don't have the Swedish release.

Flawed rip of My Truth (1999) / "9. Giving You Back" has errors beginning at 2m22s until the end. The CD must have been scratched when ripping. Thanks for sharing anyways! Robyn is a quality pop artist.

I bought "Don't stop the music" in the store today but when I came home I discovered that the disc is copy controlled and I'm not allowed to make a copy for my Ipod. Robyn, I'm a fan but I don't want to have the record company restrict what I can do with my own legal copies. Thank you Pirate Bay for the MP3s.
FYI, the Robyn album is the international edition
